p: Results: We analyzed 388 whom 142 were controls. 61.8 % of patients were males, mean age: 63 years, interquartile range (IQR) (18–90) with APACHE II of 26 (21-29) and SOFA of 9 (7-11); and in controls 67.8 % were men, mean age: 63 years, IQR (39–91). The main sources of infection were respiratory tract 47.8 % and intra-abdomen 19.8 %.
